name: Plutoid Defender
description:
SDefend the plutoid, to the very last pixel!

Plutoid Defender is a top down arcadey schmup where you must defend your core from the onslaught of a horde of insects.
Controls

Keyboard / Mouse

Rotate Left - S

Rotate Right - D

Thrust - W

Shoot - Space Bar And Left Mouse Button

Gamepad

Rotate Left - Left Stick Left, Right  Stick Left, D-Pad Left

Rotate Right - Left Stick Right, Right Stick Right, D-Pad Right

Thrust- Left Stick Up, Right  Stick Up, D-Pad Up

Shoot - All the L/R Buttons, Dualshock Square or Xbox X, or Nintendo Y

Additional Features

Please find accessibility settings in the Settings menu on the front screen. You'll find:

Fullscreen setting (Disabled by default)

Screen Shake Enable/Disable (Enabled by default)

A colorblind accessibility setting, with intensity slider to fine tune it to your personal needs. You'll find some in-game sprites available for checking colors before you jump into the game.
